language.entry: Wearing his sacred garments and his revered mask, that channels the power of the light, he does not use any conventional weapons for combat but his hands and feet instead, he is the peace keeper, he is the divine warrior, he is the Prodigy.
Don't be ridiculous! That would disturb the balance!
Don't be ridiculous! That would disturb the balance!
Corrupted individuals are not particularly fond of me.

Fast, agile and precise the Prodigy belongs to an ancient guild of holy warriors that have been protecting this world from evil for thousands of years. His strategy is quite different from our own, he moves during combat looking for the perfect opportunity to strike with deadly precision and divine power that flows through him.
The Prodigy is a unique warrior that doesn't use conventional weapons, he never rests and he calms his group as well as trains them for the sake of efficiency.
I would prefer to fight this monstrosity, but i will do as i must.
Let me help you my friend.
I will take care of that for you.
Don't worry, i will help you.
"Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.
If you are afraid of something, you give it power over you.
Like a fish, one should look for holes in the net.
Bravery is not a quality of the body. It is of the soul.
To live with fear and not be afraid is the final test of maturity.
It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
I wonder what my future holds.
I found some gems during our travels, here.
This might be of use to you.
Maybe a gem will brighten your spirit.
Keep your eyes on the sun and you will not see the shadows.
Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
The pain you feel today is only to get strength to face tomorrow.
Tough times never last, but tough people do.
Behold, the power of the light!
This fear will not stop me.
Wisdom is nothing more than healed pain.
I will take care of them!
There is no hope in this place.
I will take them all on!
Nothing compares to the power of the light.
Is this a good idea friends?
There is nothing wrong, if we return.
This is too much to bear for some.
I think we might be followed.
Friends do not abandon each other!
They will jump at us at any moment.
This pain is nothing compared to my training!
I enjoy our travels, but you are becoming a liability.
There is no time to rest!
I will use the light to destroy them all!
There is no reason to keep going.
Our fate is to die here.
Moving back, i feel more are coming.
I need to be in the perfect position!
I have to do something to help.
I will keep them occupied, run!
If this is the end, i will give them an end to remember!
We need to stop this fighting.
Light, embrace me in these dark moments.
My time to shine is not now!
They are up to something, attack!
I know what i have to do.
This fear is a lot to bear.
I'm afraid but i will not let it control me.
I wonder what lurks in those shadows.
Feeling all this pain reminds me of my training.
You all need to stop being so sluggish.
This is such a waste of time.
I hope you are all ready to fight now.
You are fortunate that i am here.
Perhaps i should lead us towards the light.
Friends, i am not impressed so far.
We could leave and come back when we are stronger.
There is no shame in retreat.
Next fight i will show you all my true capabilities.
I wish i could fight more enemies at once.!
Everything that has a beginning, has an end.
I'm here, show me what you've got.
I will take you all on!
We need to stop them now!
How did i not see that coming?
Maybe we should just bite the dust?
Just turn them to ash! Why leave?
I think more of them are on the way!
Feeling afraid. I do not like it.
Bear with me, i will carry us to victory!
You need to let me attack them.
I should be the one killing them.
I think i hear more of them coming.
Just step out of the way.
We shouldn't stay here for very long.
I think its time to leave.
I have a feeling a fight is right around the corner.
No time to stop, keep moving!
This cannot be the only way, right?
That is not what i want.
You do not have to waste that on me.
The light guides me, not you.
I know what is best for me.
No, you are playing into their strategy.
I want feel more pain, not less.
No, i do not want that.
No need to waste healing on me.
What is that going to do?
I will do what i need to do.
I think we should just leave.
The best thing to do is to leave at this point.
I'm not afraid, i just do not like where this is going.
I think something followed us here.
I hope we finish this up quickly.
How did you all survive, fighting the way you do?
Such a sad display of discipline.
There is too much fear in the air.
This entire journey has been very suspicious.
So much evil around that needs to be eradicated.
I hope we are done here...
Remember that you are alive because i allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
Like this food is going to make a difference.
What is the purpose of this?
Too bad we cannot have a nice large feast.
I was hoping this food was going to taste better.

Wearing his sacred garments and his revered mask, that channels the power of the light, he does not use any conventional weapons for combat but his hands and feet instead, he is the peace keeper, he is the divine warrior, he is the Prodigy.

Portant ses habits sacrs et son masque vnr capable de canaliser l'nergie de la lumire, il n'utilise aucune arme conventionelle pour se battre, sinon ses poings et ses pieds. Il est le gardien de la paix, il est le guerrier divin. Il est le Prodige.
Ne sois pas ridicule! Cela perturberait l'quilibre!
Ne sois pas ridicule! Cela perturberait l'quilibre!
Les individus corrompus ne m'apprcient pas particulirement...

Rapide, agile et prcis, le Prodige appartient une ancienne guilde de guerrier sacr, protgeant le monde du mal durant des millnaires. Sa stratgie est trs diffrente de la notre ; Il bouge durant la bataille, cherchant l'opportunit pour frapper avec une prcision parfaite et un pouvoir divin qui dcoule de ses attaques.
Le Prodigy est un guerrier unique qui n'utilise pas d'armes conventionnelles, il ne se repose jamais et il calme son groupe tout en les entranant dans un souci d'efficacit.
I would prefer to fight this monstrosity, but i will do as i must.
Je vais m'occuper de a pour toi.
Ne t'inquite pas, je vais t'aider.
Le courage n'est pas l'absence de peur, mais la conqute de celle-ci.
Si tu as peur de quelque chose, tu lui donnes de la puissance.
Tel un poisson nous devons chercher les trous dans les mailles du filet.
La bravoure n'est pas la qualit du corps, mais celle de l'me.
Vivre avec la peur et la repousser n'est que le test final de la maturit.
C'est n'est pas la taille du chien qui te bat, mais la taille de ce qui bat le chien.
Je me demande ce que l'avenir me rserve...
J'ai trouv quelques gemmes durant notre voyage ; Les voici.
Peut-tre qu'une gemme claircira ton me.
Toutes les routes mennent la srnit.
Concentre toi sur la lumire pour ne pas voir les ombres
Laisse tes espoirs et non ta douleur faonner ton avenir.
Travaille tes faiblesses jusqu' ce qu'elles deviennent tes forces.
La souffrance que tu ressens aujourd'hui n'est l que pour te renforcer pour demain.
Les temps forts ne persitent pas, mais les personnes fortes si.
La lumire s'coule au travers de mes poings !
Admirez la force de la lumire !
Cette peur ne me freinera pas.
La sagesse n'est rien d'autre que de la souffrance gurie.
Il n'y aucun espoir en ces lieux.
Vous ne pouvez pas arrter la Lumire !
La Lumire me donne la force !
Brlons-les jusqu' ne voir que de la cendre !
La lumire nous rend plus forts !
Rien n'est comparable la force de la Lumire.
Mes amis, est-ce vraiment une bonne ide ?
Il n'y a rien de pch s'enfuir mes amis...
Je pense que nous sommes suivis...>
Les amis ne s'abandonnent pas entre eux !
Ils nous sauteront la gorge d'ici peu...
Cette souffrance n'est rien compare mon entranement !
J'apprcie votre compagnies, mais vous commencez devenir des fardeaux.
Pas le temps de se reposer !
J'uttiliserais la lumire pour tous les dtruire !
Il n'y a aucune raison de continuer.
Notre destin est de mourrir ici.
La peur ne me contrlera pas !
Reculons, il y en a d'autres qui arrivent.
Je dois tre dans LA position parfaite !
Je dois faire quelque chose pour aider...
Je dois tre dans une meilleure position !
Si c'est a ma fin, alors laissez-moi leur offrir un final d'ampleur !
Il n'y a pas d'autres possibilits.
Il est temps de se battre !
L'heure de briller n'est pas maintenant!
Je sais ce que je dois faire.
Cette peur est un lourd fardeau...
J'ai peur, mais je ne la laisserais pas me contrler.
Nous devrions probablement battre en retraite.
Je sens quelque chose de proche.
Je me demande ce qui peut se mouvoir dans ces ombres.
Ressentir cette souffrance me rappelle mon entranement..
Je dois me battre au plus tt...
Vous devriez arrter d'tre aussi paresseux.
C'est une telle perte de temps...
J'espre que vous tes tous prts vous battre.
Vous tes fortuns que je sois l.
Peut-tre devrais-je nous conduire la Lumire.
Nous pourrions partir et revenir une fois plus fort.
Il n'y a pas de honte s'enfuir.
Au prochain combat, je vous montrerais mes vrais capacits.
J'esprais pouvoir combattre plus d'ennemis d'un coup.
Tout ce qui a un dbut a une fin.
Je suis l, montre-moi si tu en as !
Je vous emmnerais tous avec moi !
Comment n'as-je pas pu voir cela arriver ?
Nous ne pouvons pas battre en retraite !
Peut-tre devrions-nous juste mordre la poussire ?
Il y en a plus qui sont cachs dans les ombres !
Je pense qu'il y en a plus sur le chemin !
Je refuse de ressentir la peur !
Je me sens effray... Je n'aime pas a.
Essaye plus fort la prochaine fois !
Reste avec moi, je nous apporterais la victoire !
Nous devons nous regrouper, nous enfuir !
Je devrais tre celui qui les tue.
Je pense que j'en entends plus arriver...
Nous ne devrions pas rester ici trs longtemps...
La fuite est toujours une option...
Tu es ou bien chanceux ou bien...
a ne peut pas bien se finir.
Je pense qu'il est temps de s'enfuir...
Il y a quelque chose derrire nous...
Je meurs d'envie de me battre!
J'ai le sentiment qu'un combat nous attend derrire cette porte...
Pas le temps d'arrter, continue de bouger !
Cela ne peut-tre le seul moyen, si ?
Ce n'est pas ce que je veux.
Tu n'as pas gaspiller a sur moi.
La lumire me guide, pas toi !
Je sais ce qui est le mieux pour moi.
Je n'ai pas confiance en toi.
Non, tu es en train de rentrer dans leur jeu !
Je veux plus de souffrance, rien de moins !
Non, je ne veux pas de a !
Ne gaspille pas tes soins sur moi.
Je n'ai pas besoin de soins.
Je n'ai pas confiance en toi !
J'ai l'impression que ton action n'as pas de but.
Je ferais ce que j'ai besoin de faire !
Je pense qu'on devrait juste partir.
La meilleure chose faire ce point, c'est de partir.
Je n'ai pas peur, je n'aime juste pas la direction vers laquelle on se dirige !
Je pense que quelque chose nous a suivi...
Au travers de la douleur nous gagnons en sagesse.
Comment avez-vous survcu en combattant comme cela ?
Un talage de manque de discipline...
Je me sens un peu perdu...
Je vois notre fin qui s'approche.
Il y a trop de peur dans l'air...
Ce voyage tout entier est trs suspect....
Je suis incapable de te croire...
Tellement de mal que l'on se doit d'radiquer.
J'espre que nous en avons fini ici...
Rappelle-toi que tu es en vie parce que je l'accepte.
Je suis le minuit de ton me.
Je ne devrais probablement pas manger cela.
Comme si ce repas allait faire une diffrence.
Quel est le but de cela ?
Dommage que nous ne puissions pas avoir un festin digne d'un roi...
J'esprais que mon dernier repas soit meilleur que a.
I would prefer to fight this monstrosity, but i will do as i must.

Vistiendo sus ropajes sagrados y su mascara reverenciada que canaliza el poder de la luz, no usa armas convencionales para el combate sino sus puos y pies, l es el pacificador, el guerrero divino, l es el Prodigio.
No seas ridculo! Eso perturbara el equilibrio!
No seas ridculo! Eso perturbara el equilibrio!
Los individuos corruptos son particularmente reacios a mi compaa.

Rpido, gil y preciso, el Prodigio pertenece a un antiguo clan de guerreros sagrados que han estado protegiendo este mundo del mal durante miles de aos. Su estrategia es muy diferente a la nuestra, se mueve durante el combate para conseguir la oportunidad perfecta para golpear al enemigo con precisin letal y poder divino que fluye a travs de l.
Prodigio es un guerrero nico que no usa armas convencionales, nunca descansa y calma a su grupo y los entrena por su eficiencia.
I would prefer to fight this monstrosity, but i will do as i must.
Me ocupar de eso por ti.
No te preocupes, yo te ayudar.
El coraje no es la ausencia del miedo; sino la conquista de este.
Si tienes miedo a algo, le das poder sobre ti.
Como un pez, uno debe buscar los agujeros en la red.
La valenta no es una cualidad del cuerpo, lo es del alma.
Vivir con miedo y no sentir miedo es la prueba final de la madurez.
No es el tamao del perro lo importante, sino el tamao de la lucha en su interior.
Me pregunto que me deparar mi futuro.
He encontrado una gema durante nuestros viajes, ten.
Puede que esto sea de utilidad.
Puede que una gema ilumine tu espritu.
Todos los caminos encuentran la serenidad.
Manten los ojos en la luz y nunca vers las sombras.
Deja que tus esperanzas, y no tus desgracias, moldeen tu futuro.
Entrena tus debilidades hasta que sean tus puntos fuertes.
El dolor que sientes hoy es solo fortaleza para afrontar el maana.
Los tiempos duros siempre terminan, las personas duras simpre persisten.
La luz fluye a travs de m!
He aqu el poder de la luz!
Que la debilidad se convierte en tu fuerza!
La sabidura no es ms que dolor cicatrizado.
No hay esperanza en este lugar.
Yo me enfrentar a todos ellos!
No puedes parar a la luz!
Nada es comparable al poder de la luz.
Es esta una buena idea amigos?
No existe error en la retirada.
Esto es demasiado para que algunos puedan soportarlo.
Creo que nos pueden estar siguiendo.
Los amigos no abandonan a sus compaeros.
Saltarn sobre nosotros en cualquier momento.
Este dolor no es nada comparado con mi entrenamiento!
Disfruto de nuestros viajes, pero te ests volviendo una carga.
Usar la luz para destruirlos a todos!
Deberamos retirarnos, siento que ms estn por llegar.
Debo estar en la posicin perfecta!
Tengo que hacer algo para ayudar.
Si esto es el fin, les dar un final que recordar!
Luz, abrzame en estos momentos oscuros.
El momento de relucir no es este!
Hora de poner fin a esto.
Este miedo es algo difcil de sobrellevar.
Tengo miedo, pero no dejar que me controle.
Me pregunto que acecha en las sombras.
Todo este dolor me recuerda a mi entrenamiento.
Todos tenis que dejar de ser tan lentos.
Esto es una prdida de tiempo.
Espero que estis preparados para luchar ahora.
Tienes suerte de que est aqu.
A lo mejor debera guiaros hacia la luz.
Amigos, no estoy impresionado por ahora.
Podemos irnos y volver cuando seamos ms fuertes.
No existe deshonor en la retirada.
En el prximo combate os ensear todas mis aptitudes.
Ojala pudiera luchar con ms enemigos a la vez!
Todo lo que tiene un principio, tiene un final.
Aqu estoy, ensame lo que puedes hacer.
Eso no ha sido nada bueno.
Todo tiene que acabar algn da.
Convertidlos en cenizas! Por qu marcharse?
Creo que vienen ms a por nosotros!
Siento temor. Eso no me gusta.
Intntalo de nuevo con ms ganas.
Si os quedis conmigo, os llevar a la victoria!
Tenis que dejar que yo ataque.
Debera ser yo quien los estuviera matando.
Creo que oigo a ms de ellos viniendo.
Recuerda, la evasin es la clave.
Tu solo aprtate de mi camino.
No deberamos quedarnos en este lugar durante mucho tiempo.
La retirada es aun una opcin.
Creo que es hora de irnos.
Tengo el presentimiento de que lucharemos pronto.
No hay tiempo para parar, sigue avanzando!
A lo mejor existe otro camino?
Este no puede ser el nico camino, verdad?
Eso no es lo que quiero.
No tienes que gastar eso en mi.
No hay razn para utilizar eso.
La luz es mi gua, no la tuya.
S lo que es mejor para m.
No, ests cayendo en su trampa.
Quiero sentir ms dolor, no menos.
No necesitas gastar ninguna curacin en m.
Me temo que eso es un sinsentido.
La luz fluye a travs de mi.
Lo mejor que podemos hacer ahora es marcharnos.
No tengo miedo, es solo que no me gusta donde nos lleva esto.
Creo que algo nos ha seguido hasta aqu.
A travs del dolor adquirimos sabidura.
Espero que acabemos con esto pronto.
Vaya, eso s que ha sido una decepcin.
Como habis sobrevivido tanto tiempo luchando de esa manera?
Menuda muestra de disciplina tan pobre.
Veo como nuestro final se acerca.
Hay demasiado miedo en el aire.
Todo este viaje es bastante sospechoso.
Demasiado mal alrededor que debe ser exterminado.
Eso no es lo suficientemente bueno.
Recuerda que ests vivo porque lo permito.
Soy la medianoche de tu alma.
Como si esta comida fuera a marcar la diferencia.
Cul es el significado de todo esto?
Es una pena que no podamos tener un gran festn.
Esperaba que esta comida tuviera mejor sabor.

Wearing his sacred garments and his revered mask, that channels the power of the light, he does not use any conventional weapons for combat but his hands and feet instead, he is the peace keeper, he is the divine warrior, he is the Prodigy.
Don't be ridiculous! That would disturb the balance!
Don't be ridiculous! That would disturb the balance!
Corrupted individuals are not particularly fond of me.

Fast, agile and precise the Prodigy belongs to an ancient guild of holy warriors that have been protecting this world from evil for thousands of years. His strategy is quite different from our own, he moves during combat looking for the perfect opportunity to strike with deadly precision and divine power that flows through him.
The Prodigy is a unique warrior that doesn't use conventional weapons, he never rests and he calms his group as well as trains them for the sake of efficiency.
I would prefer to fight this monstrosity, but i will do as i must.
Let me help you my friend.
I will take care of that for you.
Don't worry, i will help you.
"Courage is not the absence of fear; it is the conquest of it.
If you are afraid of something, you give it power over you.
Like a fish, one should look for holes in the net.
Bravery is not a quality of the body. It is of the soul.
To live with fear and not be afraid is the final test of maturity.
It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
I wonder what my future holds.
I found some gems during our travels, here.
This might be of use to you.
Maybe a gem will brighten your spirit.
Keep your eyes on the sun and you will not see the shadows.
Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
The pain you feel today is only to get strength to face tomorrow.
Tough times never last, but tough people do.
Behold, the power of the light!
This fear will not stop me.
Wisdom is nothing more than healed pain.
I will take care of them!
There is no hope in this place.
I will take them all on!
Nothing compares to the power of the light.
Is this a good idea friends?
There is nothing wrong, if we return.
This is too much to bear for some.
I think we might be followed.
Friends do not abandon each other!
They will jump at us at any moment.
This pain is nothing compared to my training!
I enjoy our travels, but you are becoming a liability.
There is no time to rest!
I will use the light to destroy them all!
There is no reason to keep going.
Our fate is to die here.
Moving back, i feel more are coming.
I need to be in the perfect position!
I have to do something to help.
I will keep them occupied, run!
If this is the end, i will give them an end to remember!
We need to stop this fighting.
Light, embrace me in these dark moments.
My time to shine is not now!
They are up to something, attack!
I know what i have to do.
This fear is a lot to bear.
I'm afraid but i will not let it control me.
I wonder what lurks in those shadows.
Feeling all this pain reminds me of my training.
You all need to stop being so sluggish.
This is such a waste of time.
I hope you are all ready to fight now.
You are fortunate that i am here.
Perhaps i should lead us towards the light.
Friends, i am not impressed so far.
We could leave and come back when we are stronger.
There is no shame in retreat.
Next fight i will show you all my true capabilities.
I wish i could fight more enemies at once.!
Everything that has a beginning, has an end.
I'm here, show me what you've got.
I will take you all on!
We need to stop them now!
How did i not see that coming?
Maybe we should just bite the dust?
Just turn them to ash! Why leave?
I think more of them are on the way!
Feeling afraid. I do not like it.
Bear with me, i will carry us to victory!
You need to let me attack them.
I should be the one killing them.
I think i hear more of them coming.
Just step out of the way.
We shouldn't stay here for very long.
I think its time to leave.
I have a feeling a fight is right around the corner.
No time to stop, keep moving!
This cannot be the only way, right?
That is not what i want.
You do not have to waste that on me.
The light guides me, not you.
I know what is best for me.
No, you are playing into their strategy.
I want feel more pain, not less.
No, i do not want that.
No need to waste healing on me.
What is that going to do?
I will do what i need to do.
I think we should just leave.
The best thing to do is to leave at this point.
I'm not afraid, i just do not like where this is going.
I think something followed us here.
I hope we finish this up quickly.
How did you all survive, fighting the way you do?
Such a sad display of discipline.
There is too much fear in the air.
This entire journey has been very suspicious.
So much evil around that needs to be eradicated.
I hope we are done here...
Remember that you are alive because i allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
Like this food is going to make a difference.
What is the purpose of this?
Too bad we cannot have a nice large feast.
I was hoping this food was going to taste better.

Mnich przyodziany jest w wite szaty i bogosawion mask, ktra skupia w sobie moc wiatoci. Jako stranik pokoju nie uywa adnej broni, a w walce polegaja jedynie na wasnym ciele i boskiej mocy.
Nie bd mieszny! To zakcioby rwnowag!
Nie bd mieszny! To zakcioby rwnowag!
Spaczone stworzenia nie s w stanie przebywa w mej obecnoci.

Szybki zwinny i precyzyjny, Mnich naley do staroytnej grupy wojownikw, ktrzy chroni wiat przed zem od tysicleci. W walce stosuje nietypow strategi opart na cigym przemieszczaniu si w poszukiwaniu idealnej pozycji do wyprowadzenia ataku ze mierteln precyzj i bosk moc.
Prodigy to niepowtarzalny wojownik, ktry nie korzysta z broni konwencjonalnej, nigdy nie odpoczywa i uspokaja swoj grup oraz trenuje je ze wzgldu na wydajno.
Wolabym walczy z t potwornoci twarz w twarz, ale uczyni co trzeba.
Odwaga to nie wyzbycie si strachu, lecz zapanowanie nad nim.
Jeeli czego si lkasz, przekazujesz tej rzeczy wadz nad sob.
Niczym ryba, czowiek zawsze powinien szuka dziury w sieci.
Odwaga nie ley w naszym ciele, lecz w naszym duchu.
y w strachu lecz nie ba si jest prb ostateczn.
Nie twego ciaa sia w walce si liczy, lecz moc ducha twego.
By moe ci si to przyda.
Moe ten klejnot podniesie ci na duchu..
Twj duch odnajdzie drog do spokoju.
Zawsze patrz w stron soca, a nigdy nie ujrzysz ciemnoci.
Spraw aby to twe marzenia ksztatoway tw przyszo, nie twe rany.
wicz, a twa najwiksza sabo przerodzi si w tw najwieksz si.
Twj dzisiejszy bl jutro bdzie tw si.
Tak jak mot, cikie czasy utwardz ci niczym rozgrzan stal.
Niech sabo przemieni si w si!
W tym miejscu nie ma nadziei.
Nic nie moe rwna si z moc wiata.
Pwrt w cale nie byby taki gupi.
Dla niektrych to moe by zbyt wiele.
Wydaje mi si e kto nas ledzi.
Ten bl to nic w porwnaniu do moich wicze!
Lubi z wami podrowa cho zaczynacie by ciarem.
Z prochu powstae i w proch si obrcisz.
Z prochu powstae i w proch si obrcisz..
Jeeli to ma by koniec, to zadbam aby by pamitny!
Nie pozwol by me lki mn zawadney.
Co kryje si w tamtym cieniu?
Ten bl przypomina mi moje szkolenie.
Musicie si ogarn i przesta obija.
Mam nadziej e teraz jestecie gotowi do walki.
Moe to ja powinienem nam przewodzi.
Przyjaciele, jak na razie nie robicie na mnie wraenia.
Moemy odej i wrci kiedy bdziemy silniejsi.
Przy najbliszej okzaji poka wam do czego jestem zdolny.
No dawaj, poka na co ci sta.
Czy ty w ogle co trenowae?
Moe powinnimy po prostu pogodzi si z naszym losem?
Czuj strach. Nie podoba mi si to.
Trzymajcie si mnie, poprowadz nas do zwycistwa!
To ja powinienm by to zrobi.
Nie powinnimy tu zostawa zbyt dugo.
To nie moe si dobrze skoczy.
Czuj e za tym rogiem czeka na nas walka.
To nie moe by jedyny sposb?
wiato jest moim panem, nie ty.
Nie, robisz dokadnie to czego chc.
I co niby ma to sprawi?
Obawiam si, e to nic nie zmieni.
Myl e powinnimy po prostu wrci do osady.
W tej chwili najlepiej bdzie zawrci.
Nie boj si, ale nie podoba mi sie dokd to wszystko zmierza.
Uwimy si z tym jak najszybciej.
Jakim cudem wy w ogle jeszcze yjecie?
Caa ta wyprawa jest jaka podejrzana.
Tyle tu za ktre trzeba zniszczy.
Mam nadziej e to ju wystarczy...
Pamitajcie e to dziki wiatu nadal yjecie.
Co jest nie tak z tym jadem.
Szkoda e nie moemy wystawi uczty.
Miaem nadziej e bdzie lepiej samokwa.

Build up your weaknesses until they become your strong points.
The pain you feel today is only to get strength to face tomorrow.
Tough times never last, but tough people do.
Behold, the power of the light!
This fear will not stop me.
Wisdom is nothing more than healed pain.
I will take care of them!
There is no hope in this place.
I will take them all on!
Nothing compares to the power of the light.
Is this a good idea friends?
There is nothing wrong, if we return.
This is too much to bear for some.
I think we might be followed.
Friends do not abandon each other!
They will jump at us at any moment.
This pain is nothing compared to my training!
I enjoy our travels, but you are becoming a liability.
There is no time to rest!
I will use the light to destroy them all!
There is no reason to keep going.
Our fate is to die here.
Moving back, i feel more are coming.
I need to be in the perfect position!
I have to do something to help.
I will keep them occupied, run!
If this is the end, i will give them an end to remember!
We need to stop this fighting.
Light, embrace me in these dark moments.
My time to shine is not now!
They are up to something, attack!
I know what i have to do.
This fear is a lot to bear.
I'm afraid but i will not let it control me.
I wonder what lurks in those shadows.
Feeling all this pain reminds me of my training.
You all need to stop being so sluggish.
This is such a waste of time.
I hope you are all ready to fight now.
You are fortunate that i am here.
Perhaps i should lead us towards the light.
Friends, i am not impressed so far.
We could leave and come back when we are stronger.
There is no shame in retreat.
Next fight i will show you all my true capabilities.
I wish i could fight more enemies at once.!
Everything that has a beginning, has an end.
I'm here, show me what you've got.
I will take you all on!
We need to stop them now!
How did i not see that coming?
Maybe we should just bite the dust?
Just turn them to ash! Why leave?
I think more of them are on the way!
Feeling afraid. I do not like it.
Bear with me, i will carry us to victory!
You need to let me attack them.
I should be the one killing them.
I think i hear more of them coming.
Just step out of the way.
We shouldn't stay here for very long.
I think its time to leave.
I have a feeling a fight is right around the corner.
No time to stop, keep moving!
This cannot be the only way, right?
That is not what i want.
You do not have to waste that on me.
The light guides me, not you.
I know what is best for me.
No, you are playing into their strategy.
I want feel more pain, not less.
No, i do not want that.
No need to waste healing on me.
What is that going to do?
I will do what i need to do.
I think we should just leave.
The best thing to do is to leave at this point.
I'm not afraid, i just do not like where this is going.
I think something followed us here.
I hope we finish this up quickly.
How did you all survive, fighting the way you do?
Such a sad display of discipline.
There is too much fear in the air.
This entire journey has been very suspicious.
So much evil around that needs to be eradicated.
I hope we are done here...
Remember that you are alive because i allow it.
I am the midnight of your soul.
Like this food is going to make a difference.
What is the purpose of this?
Too bad we cannot have a nice large feast.
I was hoping this food was going to taste better.
